name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience in developing secure and compliant applications leveraging **Python**, **Golang**, **AWS**, **Azure**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, and industry-standard **DevOps** practices. My extensive background in full-stack development includes building high-performance solutions in healthcare and finance, utilizing technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I excel in implementing **Automated Testing**, ensuring code quality and system reliability while adhering to compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. 
I possess deep expertise in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, alongside hands-on experience in developing machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows with tools such as MLflow, Airflow, and Kubeflow. My focus is on delivering enterprise-grade platforms that harness AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation.
